title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
**Ad Description:**

Discover the magical world of Barbie like never before with the "Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)" collection! Experience the enchantment of Barbie Land as you join your favorite dolls in their adventures, laugh at their quirks, and even delve into their existential crises or life as a Ken.

This collector's edition includes not only the Blu-Ray disc but also a digital copy ‚Äì providing endless entertainment wherever you go! You'll enjoy six thrilling bonus features: "It‚Äôs a Weird World," "All-Star Barbie Party," "Musical Make-Believe," "Becoming Barbie," "Welcome to Barbie Land," and an extended look at the iconic "Playing Dress-Up" ‚Äì providing additional depth into the captivating universe of Barbie.

Live it up in Barbie Land with this must-have addition to your collection! Order now and let the adventure begin.

**Ad Description:**

Discover the magical world of Barbie like never before with the new Blu-Ray + Digital edition of "Barbie"! Journey to Barbie Land, where perfection is the norm, but even the most flawless beings face existential crises or find themselves in the role of a Ken. This captivating film takes you on an adventure filled with self-discovery, friendship, and glamour.

But wait, there's more! With your purchase of "Barbie" Blu-Ray + Digital, enjoy an extensive collection of bonus features that delve deeper into the fantastical land of Barbie:

1. It‚Äôs a Weird World - Uncover the quirks and oddities of Barbie Land that make it unlike any other place on earth!
2. All-Star Barbie Party - Get an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the making of this iconic film, featuring interviews with the cast and crew.
3. Musical Make-Believe - Sing along to your favorite tunes from the movie as Barbie and her friends explore the land of endless possibilities.
4. Becoming Barbie - Witness the transformation of a young girl into the timeless symbol of beauty, fashion, and determination that is Barbie.
5. Welcome to Barbie Land - Take a tour of this enchanting land with an all-access pass, revealing its secrets and mysteries.
6. Playing Dress-Up: An Extended Look at the Costumes of Barbie - Marvel at the intricate details and stunning designs of the iconic costumes worn by Barbie and her friends throughout their adventures.

Don't miss your chance to be a part of this magical journey! Order now and step into the world of Barbie, where dreams come true and anything is possible.
